T6 Lime tree reduce crown 1 meter below previous pollard points T1- Acacia tree in the back garden to fell to ground level.

T1 ? Pear Tree The proposed works are limited to a detailed crown inspection and the removal of deadwood as necessary throughout the canopy. No reduction in height or lateral spread is proposed, and the overall height will remain at approximately 6 metres following completion of the works. T2 ? Sycamore Tree Proposed works include the removal of hanging and damaged branches, the tidying of previous storm or snap-out damage, and the removal of deadwood throughout the crown. No crown reduction is proposed, and the tree?s height and natural form will remain unchanged at approximately 12 metres. T3 ? Lime Tree The proposed works consist solely of removing deadwood throughout the crown and tidying up old snapped branches to improve safety and overall tree condition. No reduction to height or lateral spread is proposed, and the tree will remain at approximately 7 metres following the works. T4 ? Lime Tree The proposed works are limited to the removal of deadwood throughout the crown and tidying up old snapped branches as well. No live growth will be reduced, and the overall height and shape of the tree will remain unchanged at approximately 13 metres.
addr: 36 Clapham Common North Side London SW4 0RW
